titleStmt.title: The Emperour of the East· A tragæ-comœdie. The scæne Constantinople. As it hath bene diuers times acted, at the Black-friers, and Globe play-houses, by the Kings Maiesties Seruants. Written by Philip Massinger.
titleStmt.author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper, for Iohn Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
